1.action: Advance to Illinois Avenue. If you pass "Go", collect $200.

2.action: Advance to St. Charles Place. If you pass "Go", collect $200.

3.action:
Advance token to nearest Utility. If unowned, you may buy it from the Bank.
If owned, throw dice and pay owner a total ten times the amount thrown.

4.action:
Advance token to the nearest Railroad and pay owner twice the rental. 
If Railroad is unowned, you may buy it from the Bank.

8.action: Go directly to Jail. Do not pass "Go", do not collect $200.

9.action: Make general repairs on all your property. For each house pay $25. For each hotel $100.

11.action: Take a trip to Reading Railroad. If you pass "Go", collect $200.

12.action: Take a walk on the Boardwalk.

13.action: You have been elected Chairman of the Board. Pay each player $50.

14.action: Your building and loan matures. Collect $150.

15.action: You have won a crossword competition. Collect $100.
